plugin-data.name: BookingForm
plugin-data.description: Based on Contact3, add a Booking form to Bludit to capture customer details for events driven of child pages and their Custom fields.

select-content-label: Select a static page for the booking form
select-content-tip: The list is based only on published content. The contact form will be positioned below it.
results-file-tip: The following data is stored in txt files on the web server, and are displayed in file date decending order.
bookings-display-page-tip: This will set the location where you'd like to see who has booked what.
no-events-to-display: Sorry, there are no forcoming events Listed at the moment.
your-email-placeholder: This is the address you want to be contacted with.
validate-email-placeholder: Sorry for asking you to type the email again; it's trying to prevent typos.
number-of-tickets-label: How many tickets do you need?
payment-option-label: Select how you wish to pay:
other-party-names-label: Name(s) of other members of your party?
other-party-names-placeholder: Enter a comma separated list of all other people you are getting tickets for.
sitting-near-placeholder: This might be someone booking separately; otherwise leave it as it is.
special-needs-placeholder: Otherwise leave it as it is.
your-email-tip: This is the address you want the email to be sent TO.
enter-email-address: Please enter a valid email address.
email-entered-not-same: The emails entered are not the same; please check both are correct.
enter-phone-number: Please enter a phone or mobile number.
ticket-count-zero-warning: Number of tickets must be greater than zero.
other-party-names-needed: With more than 1 ticket, please include all other party names.
tickets-not-equal-to-people:
The number of tickets do not equal the total number in your party.
Please check you guest name list and that it is comma seperated.
robot-check-warning: Please activate the checkbox, "I'm not a robot".
booking-confirmation-email: Thank you for your booking. You will be contacted as soon as possible.
booking-confirmation-screen:
Thank you for your booking.
Please check your email inbox for your confirmation email.
You will be contacted as soon as possible.
sending-email-error: Sorry, for some reason the mail server did not accept the mail for sending. Please try again later.
smtp-options: Please fill in the following values if you want to send messages by a smtp account.
payment-detail-header-tip: Enter below the address for cheques and bank to bank transfer detail for online payments
bank-details-tip: The account and sort number, which are displayed to the user when they select payment method and are included in their email booking.
treasurer-address-tip: The address where cheques are to be sent. Displayed to the user when they select payment method and is included in their email booking.
bank-detail-pre-text: Bank to bank transfer: Pay into
anti-spam-info:
Enables Google reCAPTCHA v2 in contact form.
Before activation, you need to register your website at Google reCaptcha.
Choose Version 2. Both the Site Key and Secret Key are required.
display-booking-logs-desc: The booking details are stored in logs and displayed for administrators to check.
number-of-booking-logs-to-display-label: Number of log files to display on booking infomation page:
number-of-booking-logs-to-display-tip: Display only the most recently modified log files.
booking-form-config-desc: Use the following fields to configure how emails are sent.
send-from-which-address-tip: If possible, use the email address of the visitor. However, some hosts require an email address known on the server. In this case, you can choose between the recipients address (above) or a special sender email address (below) as the sender.
domain-email-tip: Only required if you use a special email sender address. Some hosts only allow sending emails from a locally known address.
gdpr-header-tip:
If necessary, a checkbox with your own legal text can be inserted in the form.
The visitor must activate the checkbox to submit. The legal text is also inserted in the email.
